_comment: PLACEHOLDER - Replace this file with your actual Rules Editor export
_instructions: 1. Open your experience in Portal Builder: https://portal.battlefield.com/bf6
2. Go to the Rules Editor tab
3. If using blocks: Click 'Export to Script' to get the logic
4. For full experience JSON: Use browser dev tools, open Network tab, save the experience, and copy the JSON payload from the API request
5. Replace this entire file with that exported content
